HIDDEN_WRAPPER_TOOLTIP: This element is hidden, you can see it because you have admin or write access, users with read access won't see it
ERROR_FETCHING_ITEM: There was an error fetching the requested item
ERROR_ACCESSING_ITEM_HELPER: Your current account does not have the rights to access this item.
FALLBACK_TEXT: Something went wrong. Please try again. If the issue persists contact us.
ITEM_ID_NOT_VALID: Item Id is not valid, please check it again. Click on the button below to go back to Home.
NAVIGATION_ISLAND_CHAT_BUTTON_HELPER_TEX: The chatbox has not been enabled for this item.
To enable the chatbox, go in the item settings in the Builder and activate the 'Show Chat in Player' setting.
NAVIGATION_ISLAND_PINNED_BUTTON_HELPER_T: There are no items pinned for this page.
To add items to the pinned section, set them as pinned in the Builder interface.
MAP_BUTTON_DISABLED_TEXT: This item does not have a geolocation
ENROLL_SCREEN_DESCRIPTION: This resource allows access with your Graasp account. To access this course, simply click Enroll
